header.paragraph: At Netneo, we combine design, development, and artificial intelligence to create unique digital experiences. Websites, apps, and ideas that work, look great, and represent your brand. Nothing standardâ€”everything tailored to you.

services.title3: What we do for you. We transform <pink>ideas</pink> into <blue>digital</blue> solutions

servicesList.label: Apps
servicesList.title: Custom Apps
servicesList.description: Functional, fast, and tailored to your needs.

servicesList.label: Websites
servicesList.title: Smart Websites
servicesList.description: Designed to convert, optimized to stand out.

servicesList.label: SEO
servicesList.title: SEO & Strategy
servicesList.description: So they can find you, choose you, and remember you.

reasons.paragraph: At Netneo we don't do the usual. We design original solutions, without templates, without rush, without smoke. We listen to you, create with you, and we're there afterwards. That's how we work, that's how we stand out.

reasonsList.subTitle: Custom-made
reasonsList.title: Solutions without shortcuts
reasonsList.paragraph: Each project starts from scratch. No recycled templates or generic systems: only unique ideas that reflect your essence and your brand.

reasonsList.subTitle: Human
reasonsList.title: Real collaboration
reasonsList.paragraph: The treatment is direct, close, and professional. We talk with you, listen, and propose. We work as people, not as robots.

reasonsList.subTitle: Original
reasonsList.title: Make the difference
reasonsList.paragraph: No gray websites or soulless clones. We design visual experiences that stand out, connect, and make you memorable.

reasonsList.subTitle: Commitment
reasonsList.title: Value and results
reasonsList.paragraph: Your investment has a return. Our prices reflect value, not just hours. What we deliver, we stand behind.

reasonsList.subTitle: Support
reasonsList.title: After the launch
reasonsList.paragraph: After the launch, we continue with you. We take care of your website or app so that it works, evolves, and never gives you headaches.

projects.paragraph: Each project is born from a unique idea and a unique vision. Our job is to transform it into something real and impactful. Here you'll see results that speak for themselves and clients who trust what we do together.
